forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 13C. SW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 55F. SW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
